description: Helped developed a full-stack web application in an Agile Scrum Environment. Worked closely with engineers and quality assurance to improve system functionality and maintain high code quality via peer reviews CI/CD pipelines. Created unit and end-to-end tests to validate user interactions and dataflow. Additionally, obtained an active U.S. Secret-level security clearance.

Worked closely with students in 2:1 sessions, guiding them through hands-on programming projects. Encouraged curiosity and collaboration by helping students reverse-engineer games and build projects that align with their interests.
